material.mattext: Carry out the test using R, and report the test statistic and p-value.

Here is the R output:
> t.test(sleep$undergraduate,sleep$graduate,alternative = "less")
Welch Two Sample t-test
data: sleep$undergraduate and sleep$graduate t = −1.2304, df = 106.328, p-value = 0.1106 alternative hypothesis: true difference in means is less than 0 95 percent confidence interval: -Inf 0.08133355 sample estimates: mean of x mean of y 6.186667 6.420000
The test statistic is t = −1.2304 and the p-value is 0.1106.
